text: Galle Marvels (formerly Galle Titans and Galle Gladiators) is a professional franchise cricket team that plays in the Lanka Premier League (LPL). They were formed in 2020, and represent Sri Lanka's Southern Province. The team play their home matches at the Galle International Stadium in the city of Galle. ==References== Category:Lanka Premier League teams Category:2020 establishments in Sri Lanka
title: Galle Marvels
